sense.gloss: after all, in the end, anyway
(cannot) possibly, (not) at all, (not) by any means, (not) ever
Kai (former province located in present-day Yamanashi Prefecture)
inquiry into, enquiry into, prying (into), investigation, search, exploration
investigation (into a suspect), inquiry, enquiry, examination, questioning
thorough discussion, careful consideration, rigorous investigation
it cannot be helped, there is no way
after all, in the end, in short, given due consideration, when all is said and done
effect, result, benefit, help, worth, use

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑他人↑↓たにん↓のことを↑詮索↑↓せんさく↓しすぎる。
sdata.e: You are too inquisitive about other people's affairs.

sdata.j: あれこれ↑詮索↑↓せんさく↓するのはよしましょう。
sdata.e: You shouldn't even try making sense of it.

sdata.j: ↑時間↑↓じかん↓はあなたの↑好↑↓す↓きなように↑過↑↓す↓ごせばいい。↑所詮↑↓しょせん↓、あなたの↑時間↑↓じかん↓なのだから。
sdata.e: You can spend your time in any way you want; it's your time, after all.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑隣人↑↓りんじん↓はいわゆる↑詮索↑↓せんさく↓↑好↑↓す↓きなのです。
sdata.e: My neighbor is what we call a nosy person.

sdata.j: ↑私生活↑↓しせいかつ↓を↑詮索↑↓せんさく↓しないでよ。
sdata.e: Don't pry into my private life.

sdata.j: コンピューターのマニュアルを↑読↑↓よ↓むだけでは↑所詮↑↓しょせん↓↑畳↑↓たたみ↓の↑上↑↓うえ↓の↑水練↑↓すいれん↓だ。
sdata.e: Just reading a computer manual is like practicing swimming on dry land.

sdata.j: ↑人↑↓ひと↓はお↑互↑↓たが↓いに↑家↑↓いえ↓の↑詮索↑↓せんさく↓するのが↑大好↑↓だいす↓きなのだ。
sdata.e: People love to check out each other's houses.
